indicator_name: Number of disruptions to basic services, attributed to disasters
national_indicator_available: 11.5.2.b. Number of disruptions to basic services, attributed to disasters
computation_calculations:
Number of disruptions to medical and prevention services, education institutions services, and other basic services (water supply and sewerage, transport, governmental, electricity supply, emergency, communication, and sanitation services).
The indicator is part of Sendai Framework indicators.
